name: Casa Paso: the Game (Deluxe Edition)
description:
After the success of the original title, "Casa Paso: the game (Deluxe Edition)" is here to complete the experience of Paso's story. The game, now for GameBoy Color, adds various new objectives to achieve, new areas, new enemies and even... new game genres!

Among other things that changed, you will find:

- Colors!

- Improved graphics

- New features, like save(!) and a game menu

- A... phone?

- More characters, more areas, more quests
